text: Franz Griessbacher is an Austrian para-alpine skier. He represented Austria in alpine skiing at the 1988 Winter Paralympics. He won the gold medal at the Men's Downhill B1 event and also at the Men's Giant Slalom B1 event. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable" width=65% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Location !!Position !!Event !!Time |- | rowspan=2 | 1988 | rowspan=2 | 1988 Winter Paralympics | rowspan=2 | Innsbruck, Austria | bgcolor=gold | 1st | Men's Downhill B1 | 1:10.43 |- | bgcolor=gold | 1st | Men's Giant Slalom B1 | 3:04.74 |} == See also == * List of Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of Austria Category:Alpine skiers at the 1988 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1988 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing
title: Franz Griessbacher
